basics.name: Claud D. Park
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Must be the change that you want to see in the world.

work.position: Software Engineer & Security Researcher (Compulsory Military Service)
work.summary: Lead engineer on agent-less backtracking system that can discover client device's fingerprint(including public and private IP) independently of the Proxy, VPN and NAT.
highlights: Implemented a military cooperation system which is web based real time messenger in Scala on Lift.
Improved functionality on military command and control system for incident response with Java Servlet.

work.position: Game Developer Intern at Global Internship Program
work.summary: Developed in Cocos2d-x an action puzzle game(Dragon Buster) targeting U.S. market. Implemented API server which is communicating with game client and In-App Store, along with two other team members who wrote the game logic, designed game graphics.
highlights: Won the 2nd prize in final evaluation.

work.company: Undergraduate Research, Computer Vision Lab(Prof. Bohyung Han)
work.position: Researcher for <Detecting videoâ€™s torrents using image similarity algorithms>
work.summary: Researched means of retrieving a corresponding video based on image contents using image similarity algorithm.
highlights: Implemented prototype that users can obtain torrent magnet links of corresponding video relevant to an image on web site.

work.company: Software Maestro (funded by Korea Ministry of Knowledge and Economy)
work.summary: Performed research memory management strategies of OS and implemented in Python an interactive simulator for Linux kernel memory management.

Developed a proxy drive smartphone application which connects proxy driver and customer. Implemented overall Android application logic and wrote API server for community service, along with lead engineer who designed bidding protocol on raw socket and implemented API server for bidding.
Conducted penetration testing on SAMSUNG KNOX, which is solution for enterprise mobile security.
highlights: Conducted penetration testing on SAMSUNG Smart TV.

volunteer.summary: Reformed the society focusing on software engineering and building network on and off campus.
highlights: Proposed various marketing and network activities to raise awareness.

volunteer.organization: PLUS (Laboratory for UNIX Security in POSTECH)
volunteer.summary: Gained expertise in hacking & security areas, especially about internal of operating system based on UNIX and several exploit techniques.
highlights: Participated on several hacking competition and won a good award.
Conducted periodic security checks on overall IT system as a member of POSTECH CERT.
Conducted penetration testing commissioned by national agency and corporation.

volunteer.summary: Gained knowledge about several business field like Management, Strategy, Financial and marketing from group study.
highlights: Gained expertise in business strategy areas and inisght for various industry from weekly industry analysis session.

education.institution: POSTECH(Pohang University of Science and Technology)
courses: Got a Chun Shin-Il Scholarship which is given to promising students in CSE Dept.
